mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.couse_id AS "course.id", a.completion_title AS "completionTitle", a.completion_answer AS "completionAnswer", a.degree AS "degree", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.is_delete AS "isDelete",
b.couname AS "course.couname", b.couname AS "couname"
left join course b on b.id = a.couse_id left join teacourse tc on tc.couid = b.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO completion( id, couse_id, completion_title, completion_answer, degree, create_time, is_delete ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{course.id}, #{completionTitle}, #{completionAnswer}, #{degree}, #{createTime}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE completion SET couse_id = #{course.id}, completion_title = #{completionTitle}, completion_answer = #{completionAnswer}, degree = #{degree}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE id = #{id}
